Description

A wrapper for strings for buffered reading.

Methods

__construct, getSize, read,

Description

Create a new MimeBodyString object.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$sourceString string | The string we are wrapping.

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a

getSize( ) : int

Description

The length of the string.

Return value

Type Description
int The length of the string contained in the object.

read( integer   $bytesRequested, ) : string

Description

Read the next chunk of the string.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$bytesRequested integer | The size of the chunk that is to be read.

Return value

Type Description
string A corresponding piece of the string.
